name: Nimiipuu Health - Behavioral Health Services
category: American-Indian-owned Cognitive behavioral therapy in Idaho

name: Marimn Health (Formerly Benewah Medical Center)
category: American-Indian-owned Cognitive behavioral therapy in Idaho
description: Marimn Health is a federally qualified community health center serving the Coeur d'Alene Indian Reservation and surrounding areas. They offer behavioral health services and are open to all individuals, with services available on a sliding fee scale
services: American-Indian-owned Cognitive behavioral therapy in Idaho consultation

name: Indian Health Service (IHS)
category: American-Indian-owned Cognitive behavioral therapy in Idaho
description: The IHS is a federal agency responsible for providing health services to American Indians and Alaska Natives. While not a direct provider of CBT in all locations, they fund and coordinate services, often working with tribal health programs. You can find more information about their mental health programs on their website
services: American-Indian-owned Cognitive behavioral therapy in Idaho consultation
